ygData.subject: Re: Interesting poll
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone on this mailing list needs to go the poll and vote Bard! Lets get these statistics back where they belong! Faras of Qeynos Half-Elf Bard E ci Server
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone on this mailing list needs to go the poll and vote Bard!

Lets get these statistics back where they belong!

Faras of Qeynos
Half-Elf Bard
E'ci Server

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:29 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Interesting poll
>
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> This is off a spoiler site (everquest.gamestats.com).
>
> What is the Best Everquest Class?
>
> 15.9% Druid
> 10.6% Ranger
> 9.5% Cleric
> 8.6% Wizard
> 8.6% Shaman
> 7.5% Necromancer
> 6.6% Paladin
> 6.4% Monk
> 6.2% Magician
> 5.6% Enchanter
> 5% Bard
> 3.6% Warrior
> 2.8% Rogue
> 2.5% Shadowknight
>
> Total Votes: 2273
>
> Considering druids, rangers, shamen, clerics, monks, and bards
> seem to be the classes who complain the least, I thought it
> was interesting that we ended up so low on this poll. I also
> suspect a lot of people are voting based on what they've seen
> (no way would I rank magician below wizard - a L20 mage
> letting his pet tank while he meditated was easily mowing
> through orcs I was barely able to fight one on one at L24),
> rather than what they've played. Would be interesting to see
> how these percentages compare to the numbers of each class on
> the servers.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
> ----------------------------
